10.name: Gold Hoarder
10.description: Money is truly no object for you.
10.requirement: Have  coins in the wallet at one time.

20.name: Longbow Master
20.description: Kill 'em before they reach you? Kill 'em before they see you!
20.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a longbow.

29.name: Ghost Buster
29.description: Send the spirits into the Mists so they can rest in peace.

37.name: Inquest's Bane
37.description: If they are so smart, how come they couldn't stop from getting killed?

74.name: Something Lost, Something Gained
74.description: Despite a setback, you find yourself ready to embark on a larger adventure.
74.requirement: Complete the asura personal story step "A Meeting of the Minds," "Lines of Communication," or "Rakt and Ruin."

93.name: Asuran Specialty Armors
93.requirement: Soulbind  unique piece of asuran cultural armor.

98.name: To Know the Unknown
98.description: You are now a full member of the Order of Whispers.
98.requirement: Complete the personal story step "An Apple a Day."

111.name: Traveler
111.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
111.requirement: Earn  points in the Hall of Monuments.

196.name: Swashbuckler's Cove
196.description: Survive the onslaught of Swashbuckler's Cove.

275.name: Champion Magus
275.description: Standing on a smoldering pile of your enemies.
275.requirement: Win  rated arena game as an elementalist.

307.name: Master of Disaster
307.description: You can build a trebuchet in your sleep.

397.name: If We Only Had Marshmallows
397.requirement: Your team lit every bonfire in Snowblind fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

517.name: Veteran Slayer
517.description: Defeat veteran or elite foes anywhere in Tyria.

677.name: Personal Space
677.requirement: Avoid Horrik's area attacks while fighting him.

686.name: Aether Apprehender: The Aetherblade Retreat
686.requirement: Kill Aetherblades in their hidden lair during the Sky Pirates chapter.

735.name: Kiel: Advanced Support
735.description: Not for the faint of heart!
735.requirement: Complete Tiers 3 and 4 of Ellen Kiel's candidate trials.

823.name: Invasion Witness Interviewer
823.requirement: Find the witness to the first invasion in Ascalon Settlement.

870.name: Tiptoe
870.description: Sometimes it's best to avoid conflict.
870.requirement: Complete World 2, Zone 1 without angering any hillbillies.

895.name: Boss Week: Here Be Dragons!
895.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter, or any other world boss encounter,  times.

947.name: Twilight Assaulted
947.requirement: Complete Twilight Assault daily achievements or Twilight Arbor Aetherpath achievements.

963.name: Tunnels or Trees
963.requirement: Complete either an Ascalon Catacombs or Twilight Arbor dungeon (story or explorable).

995.name: WvW Premier Season: 5th Place
995.requirement: Win your league in a WvW Season.

1128.name: Tower Watchwork Dismantler
1128.requirement: Kill  of Scarlet's twisted watchwork minions.

1150.name: Fractal Fortnight: Molten Furnace
1150.description: Some folks can take the heat without even sweating.
1150.requirement: You've completed the Molten Furnace fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1386.name: Group Effort I
1386.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1386.requirement: Participate in retaking a rally point during the Battle for Lion's Arch.

1406.name: Molten Meltdown
1406.requirement: Kill Molten Alliance in Lion's Arch.

1511.name: No Free Lunch
1511.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1511.requirement: Defeat the Champion Toxic Spider Queen without allowing her to reach a cocoon.

1567.name: Fashion Forward
1567.requirement: Add  unique skins to your account wardrobe.

1647.name: Opportune Moment
1647.requirement: Find a way to sneak up on your enemy during the chase.

1800.name: Platinum
1800.requirement: Defeat Champion Mordrem Thrasher Platinum. Active during The Breach after Pact Assault Preparations has been fully completed.

1815.name: Master of the Maze
1815.requirement: Reach the center of the maze without being caught by the Mordrem lurcher.

1824.name: Fear No Evil
1824.requirement: Collect key fragments from lesser nightmare pods, and unlock the greater nightmare pod while the Hidden Depths is dark.

1909.name: Daily Hexfoundry Jumping Puzzle
1909.requirement: Complete the Hexfoundry Unhinged jumping puzzle in Sparkfly Fen.

1919.name: Daily Buried Archives Jumping Puzzle
1919.requirement: Complete the Buried Archives jumping puzzle in Cursed Shore.

1950.name: Daily Mount Maelstrom Event Completer
1950.requirement: Complete events in Mount Maelstrom in the Maguuma Jungle.

2059.name: Smotherer Smiter
2059.requirement: Defeat the cave enemy without divine flames getting smothered.

2122.name: Daily Warrior or Elementalist Winner
2122.requirement: Win  PvP match as a warrior or elementalist.

2143.name: Auric Basin Insight: Lastgear Standing
2143.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2158.name: Volcano Hero
2158.requirement: Defeat the Imbued Shaman on scale 51 or above without losing any captives.

2172.name: Cloak and Snagger
2172.description: You've stealthily glided past the Mordrem snipers and stolen their supplies!
2172.requirement: Bypass the Mordrem snipers using stealth gliding and steal their supplies!

2189.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 21
2189.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2206.name: Going Berserk
2206.requirement: Defeat the Molten Berserker before defeating the Molten Firestorm in the first phase of the encounter, then defeat the upgraded Molten Firestorm in the second phase of the encounter in the Molten Boss fractal.

2246.name: Equitable Elector
2246.description: If you want something done right...
2246.requirement: Participate in the election of all 3 potential Pact leaders.

2252.name: On Wings of Gold: Silver
2252.requirement: Deliver collected shield anomalies by gliding near the collection device.

2310.name: Rata Novus Lane Defender
2310.requirement: Successfully participate in the Rata Novus lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

2333.name: Froglicker
2333.requirement: Defeat Cotoni and Huetzi after nightfall.

2369.name: Father of Wyverns
2369.description: Just wait until their father gets home...
2369.requirement: Defeat the wyvern patriarch after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

2375.name: Mistward Pauldrons
2375.requirement: Collect all  items and skins to forge your Mistward Pauldrons.
2375.locked_text: Complete the Retribution revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Pauldrons collection.

bits.text: Defeat the Modniir Ulgoth in the Harathi Hinterlands.
Purchased for airship parts from Itzel vendors in the Heart of Maguuma.

2378.name: Tangled Depths Explorer
2378.requirement: Explore all areas in Tangled Depths.

2425.name: Ley Line Glider
2425.requirement: Glide along ley lines in Dragon's Stand.

2553.name: Mouth of Mordremoth Slayer
2553.description: Concentrated ley energy is off today's menu.
2553.requirement: Slay the Mouth of Mordremoth in Dragon's Stand.

2608.name: Auric Basin Insight: Burnisher Quarry
2608.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2661.name: Liftoff
2661.requirement: Get launched up to a cannon.

2699.name: League Thief—Champion
2699.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Champion achievement.
2699.requirement: Win 7 ranked matches as a thief.

2747.name: League Champion
2747.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension III: Monument of Legends.

2823.name: Salvation Pass Sadist
2823.description: I think I hate all ten of us.
2823.requirement: Complete each of the encounter-enhancing achievements in Salvation Pass.

2859.name: Locksmithing 201
2859.requirement: Open all the chests in World 2, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

2861.name: Course Work: Super Adventure Festival
2861.requirement: Complete three daily achievements in Super Adventure Box. Completion will earn progress in the Course Load achievement, located in the Super Adventure Box: Nostalgia achievement tab.

2989.name: Daily Tier 4 Volcanic
2989.requirement: Complete Volcanic at fractal scale 76 or higher.

3021.name: Mine Control
3021.requirement: Destroy a mine and successfully siege the stronghold.

3115.name: The Machine in the Flame
3115.description: Journal: Machine in the Flame Completed
3115.requirement: Fix the dwarven machine at the Fractured Caldera.

3164.name: A Stomping Good Time
3164.requirement: Use 20 Scarecrow or Mad King stomps against players in PvP or WvW.

3186.name: Vigilant
3186.requirement: Get all the wounded Vigil to safety without having to revive any of them.

3315.name: Well Fare
3315.description: And maybe some for Mr. Nibbles, too.
3315.requirement: Bring food to Blaine at the bottom of the well.

3347.name: The Warden Will See You Now

3454.name: Lightfoot
3454.description:
Story Instance: The Last Chance

"One foot in front of the other..."
3454.requirement: Traverse Abaddon's reliquary without any member of your party taking damage from fire traps.

3488.name: Daily Siren's Landing: Visit with a Stranger
3488.description: A little kindness goes a long way.
3488.requirement: Visit Botanist Willow and wave at her.

3492.name: Daily Siren's Landing: Oyster Farmer
3492.requirement: Collect Orrian pearls around Siren's Landing.

3522.name: Aurora: Awakening
3522.requirement: Collect all  items to prove your mastery over Living World Season 3.
3522.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

3593.name: Path of the Gods
3593.description: There WOULD be eight, but nobody could find any statues of Dhuum.
3593.requirement: Kneel at the statues of each human god.

3642.name: Academy Supply Run: Silver
3642.requirement: Earn a silver medal or better in the Academy Supply Run adventure.

3652.name: Flying Finish
3652.requirement: Finish the race around the Kodash Bazaar in first, second, or third place.

3658.name: Elon River Dive Master
3658.requirement: Use diving goggles at the various diving locations across the Elon Riverlands.

3709.name: Griffon Expert
3709.requirement: Unlock the Aerial Prowess Mastery for griffons.

3731.name: Full Rebel Assault
3731.requirement: Save all four captive villagers from execution at Bonestrand Garrison, and ensure they survive to face their enemy.

3757.name: Dragon's Lair
3757.requirement: Open the way to Glint's Lair within the time limit.

3818.name: Desert Dogs
3818.requirement: Unlock the jackal mount by completing the Djinn Enclave task region in the Desolation, and by purchasing a jackal saddle from Drojkor.

3852.name: Elon Riverlands Insight: Deadhouse Vault
3852.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Elon Riverlands.

3977.name: Family Ties
3977.description: Finally, some good news to deliver.
3977.requirement: Inform the Awakened Sunspear Champion that his family survived.

3998.name: Deathsaver
3998.description: Be the spirits' savior, or see the Eater savor.
3998.requirement: Complete the Statue of Death event.

4026.name: Istan Insight: The Wobbling Skies
4026.requirement: Discover this Istan Mastery Insight in the Domain of Istan.

4041.name: Early Release
4041.requirement: Free ten caged dissidents in Champion's Dawn.

4061.name: Portal Peacemaker
4061.requirement: Help Ninn construct a device to detect the Awakened portal invasions.

4144.name: Lasting Bonds: Where We Come From

bits.text: Earned by completing the story episode "A Bug in the System."
Turn in a simple Olmakhan bandolier to Efi, near the southern gate of Atholma.
Speak with Lorekeeper Rhosan on the north end of Atholma.
Speak with Marlen near Jemandi Market.
Find Ewyn's retreat to the east of Olma's Legacy.
Explore above the Specimen Chamber using your jackal.

4173.name: Master Diver: Snowden Drifts
4173.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
4173.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Snowden Drifts.

4180.name: Master Diver: Harathi Hinterlands
4180.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
4180.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Harathi Hinterlands.

4201.name: Guns, Germs, and Steal
4201.requirement: Assist the villagers in the Arkjok Farmlands with their scarab problem.

4439.name: (Annual) Halloween Rituals
4439.requirement: Complete  Annual Halloween achievement. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4447.name: (Annual) Mad King's Clock Tower
4447.requirement: Complete the Mad King's Clock Tower or Stopped Clock Tower jumping puzzles. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4530.name: Chasing Tales: Peerless Archer
4530.description: Some believe Azra never missed a single shot.
4530.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a longbow in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 30 enemies with a longbow in Thunderhead Peaks.

4539.name: Underworld's Angels
4539.requirement: Take a roller beetle from Dragon's Claw and ride into a hole in the ice at the Dredgeways.

4738.name: Skyscale Rider: Shiverpeak Mountains
4738.description: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound
4738.requirement: Complete all of the Reality Rifts in the Shiverpeak Mountains.

4743.name: Daily Dragonfall Crystal Bloom Base Builder
4743.requirement: Upgrade the camp in the Burning Forest by completing events in the area.

4776.name: Princess of the Arena
4776.requirement: Finish the season in 4th–10th place on the skill rating leaderboard.

4848.name: Winner's Circle
4848.requirement: Pick the winner in the Dragon Bash moa race.

4901.name: Too Slippery
4901.description: Story Instance: A Race to Arms
4901.requirement: Defeat the icebrood construct within the time limit.

4963.name: Hotshot
4963.requirement: Shoot ten balloons in the target shooting event without missing or dropping your rifle.

5075.name: Daily Bonus Rewards: Infinirarium and Secret Lair
5075.requirement: Protect the Infinirarium from rampaging toys, or bring the cheer of Wintersday to the Secret Lair of the Snowmen.

5081.name: Blessing of the Celestials
5081.requirement: Open the Chest of the New Year in the Celestial Challenge in Divinity's Reach.

5140.name: Idolatry
5140.requirement: Destroy  small Jormag idols during or following The Hunt Begins chapter.

5171.name: Caledon Forest Novice Explorer
5171.requirement: Complete renown hearts, unlock points of interest and waypoints, and view vistas in the beginning area of Caledon Forest.

bits.text: Help Delilah keep the farmer's fields safe.
Help Gemai support the wardens of Wardenhurst.
Help Elain clear the spider cave.
Assist Valiant Caillech with the Risen.
Help Warden Brulians clear undead creatures from the area.
Help defend Caer Astorea from the Nightmare Court.
Disrupt the Nightmare Court at Briarthorn Den.

5273.name: Special Mission: Bolster the Fort
5273.requirement: Spend  War Supplies to repair damaged structures or purchase base upgrades at Fort Defiance in Drizzlewood Coast.

5302.name: Community Conqueror
5302.requirement: Win a 5v5 community tournament run by an ArenaNet Partner.

5352.name: Flight of the Eagle Spirit: Gold
5352.requirement: Complete the Flight of the Eagle Spirit adventure with a gold ranking.

5392.name: Special Mission: The Fallen
5392.requirement: Defeat  Fallen in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.
5392.locked_text: Unlock by using Corrupted Intel Documents.

5420.name: Citadel Crasher
5420.requirement: Siege the Frost Citadel and defeat the Claw of Jormag.

5498.name: Champions Insight: Brisban Wildlands
5498.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Brisban Wildlands Dragon Response Mission, accessed via asura gate in Eye of the North.

5577.name: Weekly Cantha Strikes
5577.requirement: Complete  unique Canthan strike within a week.

5622.name: Top Dragon Responder: Bloodtide Coast
5622.requirement: Complete  Bloodtide Coast Dragon Response Mission with all challenges active.

5637.name: Tengu Supporter
5637.requirement: Purchase  Tengu Supply Box at the Eye of the North.

5674.name: Choya vs. World
5674.description: Note: This achievement functions on the honor system.
5674.requirement: While under the effects of the Choya Elixir, capture the largest World vs. World objective you can. Then, and only then, report your accomplishments to the choya sage in Lion's Arch.

5680.name: Ooze Transportation 203
5680.description: Deliver an ooze from the first ascent up the mountain cavern.
5680.requirement: Deliver an ooze to the ooze farmer in World 2, Zone 3 of Super Adventure Box.

5711.name: Turtle-Powered Demolitions
5711.requirement: Deliver / unit of ley-line energy while piloting a siege turtle.

5713.name: League Conqueror—2v2 Season Four
5713.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Four.

5772.name: Fractal Rush Global Ranks
5772.requirement: Speak with the Fractal Rush field leader in Lion's Arch once the global goals have been met.

5818.name: Return to Taimi's Pet Project
5818.requirement: Complete the mission Taimi's Pet Project in Living World Season 3 Episode 5.

5853.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Twenty-Eight
5853.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Eight.

5859.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Twenty-Eight
5859.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Eight.

5878.name: Return to From the Ashes
5878.requirement: Complete the story mission From the Ashes in Living World Season 4 Episode 4.

5928.name: Ore Miner: Sandswept Isles
5928.requirement: Mine ore  times in the Sandswept Isles.

5987.name: Woodland Management: Forging Steel
5987.requirement: Log wood  times in Forging Steel.

6090.name: End of Dragons: Act 1 Mastery
6090.requirement: Complete all  End of Dragons: Act 1 achievements.

6145.name: Master Untamed
6145.requirement: Completely train the ranger's untamed elite specialization.

6191.name: Seitung Province Insight: Derelict Temple
6191.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6213.name: Protector of Kaineng
6213.requirement: Destroy  malfunctioning jade mechs in New Kaineng City.

6221.name: Resting Heart
6221.requirement: Clear every room in the Valdhertz Crypts.

6251.name: Data Breach
6251.description: You're the hero! It's not a privacy violation if you do it!

6259.name: The Future in Jade
6259.description: Journal: The Future in Jade Completed

6322.name: Better Be Nimble
6322.description: Who knew saltspray dragons had such terrible breath?
6322.requirement: Defeat Void Ishan without being damaged by its acid breath attack.

6352.name: Fish Are Friends
6352.requirement: Jump into the water while carrying the live fish during your fish delivery.

6550.name: Total Coverage
6550.requirement: While challenge mode is active, defeat Mai Trin and the Echo without dying or being afflicted with the Exposed condition.

6568.name: Fractal Recursion: Aetherblade Retreat
6568.requirement: Complete the Aetherblade fractal after completing the "Sky Pirates" episode.

6646.name: Dodging Attacks I
6646.requirement:
Dodge  incoming attack from enemies.

<c=@reminder>Dodging allows you to evade incoming attacks by spending endurance to roll out of danger, making you temporarily invulnerable. "Evaded!" will appear over your character when you successfully dodge an attack.</c>

6728.name: Decade of Adventure: Maguuma Jungle
6728.requirement: Complete  events in the Maguuma Jungle region.

6774.name: Dokkaebi Weapon Collection
6774.requirement: Unlock all  Dokkaebi weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6777.name: Six More Minutes to Knightfall
6777.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
6777.requirement: Defeat all three assault knights within six minutes after the event starts.

6803.name: Priority Strike: Old Lion's Court
6803.requirement: Complete the Old Lion's Court Strike Mission.

6887.name: League Slayer—2v2 Season Nine
6887.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 2v2 Season Nine.

6971.name: Hide-and-Seek in the Wizard's Tower
6971.requirement: Win 20 games of hide-and-seek with the apprentice in the Wizard's Tower.

7005.name: Skyforged Weapon Collector
7005.requirement: Unlock all  Skyforged weapon skins by completing events and looting chests in Amnytas or purchasing them from the trading post and binding them to you.

7009.name: Wizard's Tower: Fly by Night—Gold
7009.requirement: Earn a gold medal or better in the Wizard's Tower: Fly by Night adventure.

7020.name: Amnytas Rift Hunting
7020.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Amnytas.

7030.name: Storm's Eye Weapon Collector
7030.requirement: Unlock all  Storm's Eye weapon skins by crafting them or purchasing them from the trading post and binding them to you. Recipes can be purchased from Faction Provisioners in Skywatch Archipelago after unlocking the Eagle Eye weapon skins.

7055.name: Rise and Shrine
7055.description: They'll grow into those ears eventually.
7055.requirement: Play with all shrine guardian infants in Skywatch Archipelago at least once.

bits.text: 01—Wizard's Ascent: Attracted to the smell of Kryptis baits in Wizard's Ascent.
03—Rata Novus Promenade: Examined by the large microscopes.
04—Maguuma: Enjoying a view of a broken bridge.
05—Kaineng: A red tree among the greenery.
07—Droknar: By Droknar's Forge, what a statue!
09—Shattered Atoll: Near a table in some ruins.
10—Rata Novus Promenade: Nice view from Akeem's Tower.
11—Stargaze Ridge: On a pillar that Dagda can't perceive.
12—Middle Islands: Found near two blue orbs.
13—Wizard's Ascent: Enjoys watching skyscales hitting targets from an island.
14—Garenhoff: Snug between two trees on an island.
15—Rata Novus Promenade: Atop small floating rocks by the chak.
17—Kaineng: The second floor of the Ministry of Transit.
20—Wizard's Tower: Atop a rock sculpture that stands out.
21—Wizard's Ascent: Gearing up with new weapons.
22—Garenhoff: Likes being on something near the water, if there was water.
23—Eastern Ridge: Found running on the lower rings.
24—Lyhr's Design: Enjoys the view of Wizard's Ascent.
25—Kaineng: Listens to broadcasts from atop the roofs.
27—Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03: Hidden among the naga's crates.
29—The Skyward Marches: Enjoys the sounds of windmills.
30—Rata Novus Promenade: Spends times around consoles.
31—Droknar's Light: In a room nearby that can hear a large ice elemental and belligerent dwarves.
32—Droknar's Light: Loves to descend down the minecarts.
33—Rata Novus Promenade: Spends lots of times roaming around consoles.
34—Wizard's Ascent: Likes exploring the eastern courtyard of Wizard's Ascent.
35—Soaring Aerie: Takes the scenic route at Soaring Aerie.

7236.name: Commander Without a Cause
7236.requirement: Investigate reports about a new group operating in Tyria.

7576.name: Asthenes Acrobatics
7576.requirement: Defeat the chapter boss without being downed.

7603.name: WvW Rush Caravan Disruptor
7603.requirement: Destroy  enemy supply caravan in World versus World.

7623.name: WvW Rush Caravan Disruptor 2
7623.requirement: Destroy  enemy supply caravan in World versus World.

7712.name: Convergence Creature Crusher
7712.description:
Bash the demon! Smash the demon! Drive it right back into its den!
Bash the demon! Smash the demon! May it never rise up again!
7712.requirement: Defeat  enemies in Convergences. Veteran, elite, champion, and legendary enemies give more progress.

7720.name: Continuous Convergence Conqueror
7720.description: Still waiting on that tea, Zojja.

7732.name: If It Ain't Broke
7732.description: Sometimes you're the hammer, and sometimes you're the nail.
7732.requirement: Defeat the Kryptis attacking the newly rebuilt turrets in Heitor's Dominion in Inner Nayos.

7746.name: Daily Twisted Marionette
7746.requirement: Complete the Twisted Marionette group meta-event, which can be accessed from the Eye of the North.

7789.name: Diving Goggles: Rock Top to Rock Bottom
7789.description: Watch out for the branch on the way down!
7789.requirement: Jump off a high rock into the water near the Fortress of the Founding.

7812.name: Told You So
7812.description: That's what you get for not reading.
7812.requirement: Miss the jump off a high rock into the water near the Fortress of the Founding.

7876.name: Legendary Genius
7876.requirement: Win  rated arena game as an engineer.

7890.name: High Fashion
7890.requirement: While under the effects of a Fool's Tall Tonic, participate in fashion shows in Lion's Arch as a contestant or audience voter.

7957.name: Sorrow's Furnace Veteran
7957.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

7978.name: Anvil Rock Veteran
7978.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8056.name: Dzagonur Veteran
8056.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8096.name: What Was Before
8096.description: Sounds like we need some kind of astral herald to spread these learnings from Inner Nayos.
8096.requirement: Search Inner Nayos for the relics that hint at the past.

bits.text: Speak with Tecla the Venerable at the forward bivouac.
Etched Tablet: East from Mourning's Shade, past the stairs where dreams begin their ascent, under gnarled crimson roots.
Petulant Cutting Stone: Between extractors, where Bleeding Wastes meet gray skies.
Dream Essence: High above the pools of Mourning's Shade.
Cursed Fabric: High on the rocks of the central Commons, staring down on the forward bivouac.
Imitating Chalice: On the western rim above the Old Settlement's founding fort.
Dream Essence: In the Old Settlement's southern grasslands, near stones bathed in starlight.
Baleful Glass: South of Nyedra's coliseum, where limbs reach west toward Zakiros.
Vexed Urn: Central in Nyedra Surrounds, with a view of the fortress to the south.
Dream Essence: In northeast Defiled Cradle, where Eventide's bridge once marched east to Mourning's Shade.
Return to Tecla the Venerable at the forward bivouac.

8116.name: Weekly Diver Registration
8116.requirement: Speak with Astora in Lion's Arch to learn more about sunken treasure.

8185.name: Journeykin Outpost Renown Mastery
8185.description: Diplomacy isn't always about paperwork or negotiations. Sometimes you gotta get your paws a little dirty.
8185.requirement: Gain favor with the lowlanders to grow your friendship.

8188.name: Moon Camp Covert Salmon Run: Silver
8188.requirement: Earn a silver medal in the Moon Camp Covert Salmon Run.

8244.name: Keeper of the Dance Floor
8244.description: Show off some of your unique moves in the dance circle.
8244.requirement: /dance during the "Dance among the kodan" event.

8310.name: We Vote On It
8310.requirement: Vote both ways during the vote.

8369.name: Renowned Hero: Sandswept Isles (Weekly)
8369.requirement: Complete renown hearts in the Sandswept Isles.

8411.name: Returning to the Rise of Kralkatorrik
8411.requirement: Meet with Gorrik in Lion's Arch  to learn about the Return to Season 4 event.

8429.name: Road of Victory IX
8429.requirement: Earn Proofs of Glory through high placement in monthly tournaments.

8433.name: Mystical Beast Weapon Collection
8433.requirement: Unlock all  Mystical Beast weapon skins in your wardrobe.

8435.name: (Weekly) Homestead Trick-or-Treating
8435.requirement: Ring haunted bells at guild halls or other players' homesteads  times.

8481.name: Infinite Flame Ram
8481.requirement: Complete all tasks to unlock the Infinite Flame Ram.

bits.text: Purchase a Ram Token from the skirmish supervisor.
Purchase a Flame Ram Mechanism from the skirmish supervisor.
Enter the Obsidian Sanctum jumping puzzle through a mystic portal in one of the keeps in Eternal Battlegrounds.
Complete the associated siege expertise achievement.
Purchase flame ram parts from Roy in Obsidian Sanctum.
Salvage parts from the broken down flame ram in the Dredge Tunnels in Eternal Battlegrounds.

8550.name: Relics—Core Set 2
8550.requirement: Bind  Core Set 2 relics to your account by crafting them or purchasing them from the Trading Post.

8596.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Dragonfall
8596.description: Everybody, take what you can and evacuate to the homestead immediately.
8596.requirement: Complete events in Dragonfall. Group events will award more progress.

8600.name: Barren of Mistburned
8600.requirement: Clear all Mistburned enemies out of the Veiled Library and its surroundings.

8658.name: (Annual) Dog Days
8658.requirement: While under the effects of a Fool's Dog Treat, sit or sleep in the dog park in Lion's Arch for several minutes.

8738.name: Bava Nisos Insight: Central Gullet
8738.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery insight in Bava Nisos.

8752.name: Traversing the Titan
8752.requirement: Open the chest at the end of the jumping puzzle.

8765.name: All That Remains
8765.requirement: Find all six of the memory fragments in the Kinfall fractal.

8789.name: Reliving Secrets of the Obscure
8789.requirement: Complete pivotal story missions from Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure.

bits.text: Eventide's March: Coliseum of the Midnight King

8802.name: Return to Secrets of the Obscure
8802.requirement: Complete  achievements from the Return to Secrets of the Obscure event.
